title: CSS/DSS may be permitted to be constructed in LOS in such a way that area shall not exceed the limit prescribed in the Regulation No
clause_text: CSS/DSS may be permitted to be constructed in LOS in such a way that area shall not exceed the limit prescribed in the Regulation No.27.
